mapper.select: select doc_name, doc_qualification, doc_mobile, doc_registration, doc_email, doc_address from market.monthly_expiry from care.doctor
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO care.doctor (doc_name, doc_qualification, doc_mobile, doc_registration, doc_email, doc_address) VALUES (#{name},#{qualification}, #{mobile} , #{reg}, #{email},#{address} );
INSERT INTO care.patient ( name, age, mobile, village) VALUES ( #{name}, #{age}, #{mobile}, #{village});
